SO Paul trimmed fat from the prosciutto before wrapping the chicken. Yay or nay?
@mcurie Best chances are in winter. Not sure how frequent.
@mcurie They aren't making any moves to ban gay people from entering or visiting though.
@mcurie I wouldn't be allowed into USA? Why?
@mcurie Just come back to Scotland.
@mcurie Oh I thought you meant you wouldn't be allowed in.
@Saintchris13 Ah ok will maybe do that soon. It has happened before so we should have known better. Only ended up with 4 caches today. Ugh!
@Saintchris13 it was awful. Car nearly ended up in the ditch and were trapped by other cars. ðŸ˜‚
@Saintchris13 We attempted the really steep one which has a mast and public toilets at the top (on the right after leaving Falkland).
@southofkinross What are you like haha.
Ended up in a nice first instead. https://t.co/CWTTltrWJD
Tired to get up to the Lomond Hills park for a walk but the car couldn't get through the ice.
@BlueFire94 Ah cool. Is it Linlithgow you live in?
@BlueFire94 Do you jump on a train into town?
@BlueFire94 Not sure at the moment. Yesterday was vile weather so I guess see what it's like today.
@mcurie Oh , hope you don't mind me asking but how come?
@BlueFire94 Just watched the first one, had never seen it before!
@BlueFire94 saw you were looking for someone to see T2 with.
@southofkinross posh cunt.

@BlueFire94 It's ok. More upset that all my Germany and Boston pics are on it.

@southofkinross Yes, complimentary wine! On the way back from Belize I watched a sick movie called Don't Breath.

@BlueFire94 I love it! So fresh and clean.
@southofkinross Morning from a frosty Edinburgh! How are you?
@jhazan Consuming asparagus in any state, even visually, can do this.

I can't believe this time last week I was collecting plant specimens in the Belize rainforest. I long to go back.
@buymobiles Hi. Made an order within the time for next day delivery but still shows as awaiting dispatch?
